1.question: What was the primary aim of the study conducted in England regarding COVID-19 booster vaccinations?

options.A: To determine the effectiveness of the first booster dose.
options.B: To identify groups at elevated risk of COVID-19 death after a second booster dose.
options.C: To compare the effectiveness of different COVID-19 vaccines.
options.D: To assess the impact of COVID-19 on healthcare workers.
options.E: To evaluate the side effects of booster vaccinations.
